channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope Francis changed the plans for his own funeral before his death. Here’s what to expect
item.description: Funeral rites are different this time around.

item.title: Secondhand stores selling tariff-free goods are poised to be big winners from President Trump’s trade war
item.description: American styles carry international influence, but nearly all of the clothing sold domestically is made elsewhere.

item.title: Tesla kicks off earnings season for Big Tech’s ‘Magnificent 7’ amid huge market cap drops spurred by ‘massive uncertainty and chaos’ from White House
item.description: Since President Trump's Jan. 20 inauguration, Big Tech stocks have been on a see-sawing ride that has eviscerated trillions of dollars in shareholder ...

item.title: Senior leaders are feeling the burden of cuts to middle management
item.description: Senior executives are shouldering more work as middle management disappears.

item.title: Executives are drowning. Blame the vanishing middle management layer
item.description: Senior executives are feeling overwhelmed as they absorb more direct reports and tasks once held by middle management.

item.title: Golfers think the sport keeps them healthy. New research backs that up.
